names.bio: Corey Burton was born on August 3, 1955 in West Los Angeles, California, USA as Corey Gregg Weinberg. He is known for his work on The Hunchback of Notre Dame (1996), Atlantis: The Lost Empire (2001) and Aladdin (1992).
